> 
> **504 Gateway Time-out**

> nginx/1.4.7

Me too!
Anyone would think we're less than a couple hours from release....
Actually yeah, the forums are getting laggy, seemed okay for a moment and then definetly got laggy.

To emphasize-

**PATCHER IS NOW NOT WORKING**
Are WE causing the lag? It doesn't seem like too many of us are here right now.

> 
> Anyone would think we're less than a couple hours from release....

Half Life 3 confirmed?!?!

\*THUMP\*

I think the hype train hit something!!

> 
> To emphasize-
> **PATCHER IS NOW NOT WORKING**

**Why does this matter?**

> 
> To emphasize-
> **PATCHER IS NOW NOT WORKING**

Is that the standalone version or steam version?

> 
> **Why does this matter?**

What if it keeps "not working" tomorrow? \*shudders\*
Ksp store also 504.
Website download page is down.

> 
> I just got a 502 badgateway.... ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)

yup me too.
What time is in Mexico right now?

> 
> Ksp store also 504.

I got a 500 internal server error, I hope it means they are upgrading it.
**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-26T19:30:18Z" title="04/26/2015 07:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 26, 2015</time> by RocketPilot573**

> 
> What time is in Mexico right now?

Almost 3PM.

This train is gaining speed. Whether or not it's because of hype is to be debated.

Also, 160 PAGES MAN!

> 
> Is that the standalone version or steam version?

Standalone

> 
> snip

Engage the hype

> 
> What time is in Mexico right now?

Sunday, noonish or early afternoonish. It's kinda mid-afternoon in EST EDT, and I think they're a couple hours behind that at Squad HQ..

> 
> Almost 3PM.

I live in the same timezone as them and it is 2:29PM

> 
> Almost 3PM.

3PM of Sunday right?

Warp factor 11!

Engage!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> 3PM of Sunday right?

Sunday, yes.

Forum lag seems to have eased.
Wait, what timezone does squad live in?
Central, I think? Two timezones ahead of me, which is PST.
